Description.Text: Please note that some facilities (such as gym, sauna and jacuzzi) may incur extra local charges.

Club es Talaial Apartments are situated around 50 metres from the beach in the Es Fort district of the popular resort of Cala d'or on the southern east coast of Majorca. The apartments are approximately 60km east of the capital Palma and the Son Sant Joan International airport, and around 500 metres from the pedestrianised centre of the resort, where you will find a wide selection of bars, restaurants and shops.

Guest facilities on offer includes a 24 hour reception area with currency exchange services, along with a games room, an air conditioned buffet style restaurant and snack bar, luggage and courtesy rooms for late departures, small on site supermarket, laundry and medical services and both lounge and pool bars.
